Enum Class SymmetricAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<SymmetricAlgorithm>
com.dua3.utility.crypt.SymmetricAlgorithm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<SymmetricAlgorithm>, Constable
public enum SymmetricAlgorithm extends Enum<SymmetricAlgorithm>
Enum representing symmetric encryption algorithms.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    AES
    Advanced Encryption Standard with Galois/Counter Mode (AES-GCM) Provides both encryption and authentication with a 256-bit key by default

    • isAuthenticated

      public boolean isAuthenticated()
      Checks if this algorithm provides authenticated encryption. Authenticated encryption algorithms provide both confidentiality and authenticity.
      Returns:
      true if the algorithm provides authenticated encryption, false otherwise

    • validateKeySize

      public void validateKeySize(int keySize) throws InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
      Validates that the given key size is valid for this algorithm.
      Parameters:
      keySize - the key size in bits to validate
      Throws:
      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - if the key size is not valid for this algorithm
